        </div>
        <div class="menu-items research">
         <div class="heading">
          <a class="sys_0 sys_t0" href="/work-with-us/research" title="Our research">
           Visit Research home
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="main-links">
          <div>
           <strong>
            Our research
           </strong>

             <a class="sys_0 sys_t0" href="/work-with-us/research/research-highlights" title="Research Highlights">

     </section>
    </header>
    <article id="main-content" itemprop="mainEntity" itemtype="http://schema.org/CreativeWork" role="main">
     <section class="hero-container">
      <div class="image-container">
       <div class="overlay">
       </div>
       <video autoplay="" data-object-fit="cover" loop="" muted="" playsinline="" poster="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/derwent-building-hubs-business-school-exterior-77.xc5c04ada.jpg?w=1900&amp;h=700&amp;fit=crop" preload="metadata">
        <source src="/assets/section/homepage/videos/clearing-2020-hp-hero.mp4" type="video/mp4">
        </source>
       </video>
      </div>
      <div class="content-container">
       <div class="_container">
        <h1 class="heading-1 -big">
         Study at Hull in 2021
        </h1>
        <div class="button -bg-pink -transparent">
         <a href="https://www.hull.ac.uk/choose-hull/study-at-hull/visit-us/open-days">
          Register for a Virtual Open Day
         </a>
         <a href="https://www.hull.ac.uk/study/undergraduate">
          Watch sessions on demand
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <section class="events-container -blue">
      <div class="_container">
       <div class="event-section">
        <h2 class="heading-2">
         There's no place like Hull
        </h2>
        <p>
         Find out why you should make Hull your first choice.
        </p>
        <a class="block-links" href="https://www.hull.ac.uk/study/undergraduate" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         Study an undergraduate degree
         <span>
         </span>
        </a>
        <a class="block-links" href="https://www.hull.ac.uk/study/order-or-download-a-prospectus" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         Order a prospectus
         <span>
         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="event-section subject">
        <div>
         <div class="content">
          <h3 class="heading-3">
           Find a course now
          </h3>
          <p>
           Browse all of our courses, and find the one that’s perfect for you.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="interaction">
          <div class="dropdown-container" x-data="dropdown()">
           <div class="dropdown-button" x-on:click="open = true">
            Select a subject...
           </div>
           <div class="dropdown-list" x-on:click.away="open = false" x-show.transition="open">
            <ul>
             <template x-for="option in options">
              <li>
               <a x-bind:href="option.value" x-text="option.label">
               </a>
              </li>
             </template>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="button">
           <a class="-dark-blue-text" href="/search/courses?level=undergraduate">
            View all courses
           </a>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event-section feature">
        <a href="https://virtualtour.hull.ac.uk/">
         <picture>
          <source data-srcset="/assets/section/personal-statement/site-elements/images/monika-hull-fair-crop.x254ae456.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 450px)" type="image/webp">

            Take a Virtual Tour
           </h3>

            Walk in our students' shoes for a while and see what Hull has to offer.
           </p>
          </div>

     <section class="choose-hull">
      <div class="_container">
       <div class="content">
        <h2 class="heading-2">
         This. Is.
         <br/>
         <span class="-big">
          Hull.
         </span>
        </h2>
        <p>
         And it's yours for the taking.
        </p>
        <div class="button -bg-pink">
         <a href="/choose-hull/student-life">
          Choose Hull
         </a>
         <a href="/special/applying-hub">
          How to apply
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>

     <section class="team-gb">
      <div class="bg">
       <div class="_container">
        <div class="content">
         <p class="subtitle">
          Official partner of Team GB
         </p>
         <h2 class="heading-2">
          Be part of something
          <span>
           extraordinary
          </span>
         </h2>
         <p>
          We believe there’s a spark of extraordinary in everyone. With the right opportunities ahead and a dedicated team behind, you too can let it shine.
         </p>
         <div class="button">
          <a class="-dark-blue-text" href="/teamgb">
           Experience the extraordinary
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

       <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/svg/team-gb-standalone.svg"/>
      </div>
     </section>
     <section class="study-with">
      <div class="_container">
       <div class="-row">
        <div class="content -half">
         <h2 class="heading-2 -large">
          Study with us
         </h2>
         <p>
          From our friendly academics, to our beautiful campus, and our superb facilities, there are more reasons than ever to choose Hull.
         </p>
         <div class="link-block">
          <a class="block-links" href="/search?cat=Courses&amp;q=">
           All courses
           <span>
           </span>
          </a>
          <a class="block-links" href="/study/undergraduate">
           Undergraduate
           <span>
           </span>
          </a>
          <a class="block-links" href="/study/postgraduate/research/phd">
           PhD scholarships
           <span>
           </span>
          </a>
          <a class="block-links" href="/choose-hull/study-at-hull/international">
           International
           <span>
           </span>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="half-block">
       <picture>
        <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=450&amp;h=270&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 450px)" type="image/webp">
         <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=450&amp;h=270&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 450px)">
          <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=767&amp;h=270&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 767px)" type="image/webp">
           <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=767&amp;h=270&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 767px)">
            <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=991&amp;h=730&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 991px)" type="image/webp">
             <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=991&amp;h=730&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 991px)">
              <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=600&amp;h=730&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 1200px)" type="image/webp">
               <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=600&amp;h=730&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 1200px)">
                <source alt="" data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=1200&amp;h=730&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" type="image/webp">
                 <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/clearing-campaign-photoshoot-2019-lucy-walch-biomedical-sciences-69.xab8b2e41.jpg?w=1200&amp;h=730&amp;fit=crop"/>
                </source>
               </source>
              </source>
             </source>
            </source>
           </source>
          </source>
         </source>
        </source>
       </picture>
       <div class="quote">
        <blockquote>
         <p>
          I've had the best time since coming to Hull. It's full of diverse people. My parents were so impressed they said I had to go!
         </p>
        </blockquote>
        <div class="person">
         <div class="name">
          Lucy Walch
         </div>
         <div class="course">
          Biomedical Science
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <section class="success-begins">
      <div class="_container">
       <h2 class="heading-2 -large">
        Where success begins
       </h2>
       <ul class="-row">
        <li class="-third">
         <div class="image">
          <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/svg/award.svg"/>
         </div>
         <div class="text">
          We were awarded
          <strong>
           silver
          </strong>
          for our teaching excellence in 2018.
          <sup>
           1
          </sup>
          <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="https://preview-uni-hull.cloud.contensis.com/assets/section/homepage/images/logos/tef-silver-3x.png" height="20" width="53"/>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="-third">
         <div class="image">
          <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/svg/trophy.svg"/>
         </div>
         <div class="text">
          Named in the
          <strong>
           top 50
          </strong>
          UK institutions for research power by the
          <em>
           Times Higher Education.
          </em>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="-third">
         <div class="image">
          <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/svg/graduation-cap.svg"/>
         </div>
         <div class="text">
          <strong>
           95.9%
          </strong>
          of students are in work or further study six months after graduating.
          <sup>
           2
          </sup>
         </div>
        </li>
       </ul>
       <div class="feature -row">
        <div class="-third">
         <picture>
          <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/david-victor-ovuakporie-msc-business-management-350-retouched.x0cc6736e.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 450px)" type="image/webp">
           <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/david-victor-ovuakporie-msc-business-management-350-retouched.x0cc6736e.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 450px)">
            <source alt="" data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/david-victor-ovuakporie-msc-business-management-350-retouched.x0cc6736e.jpg?w=405&amp;h=480&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" type="image/webp">
             <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/david-victor-ovuakporie-msc-business-management-350-retouched.x0cc6736e.jpg?w=405&amp;h=480&amp;fit=crop"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </source>
         </picture>
         <div class="content -bg-blue">
          <div class="card">
           <h3 class="heading-3">
            Postgraduate
           </h3>
           <div class="description">
            <p>
             Go to the next level with one of our Masters courses and help yourself stand out from the crowd.
            </p>
            <div class="button">
             <a class="-deep-blue-text" href="/study/postgraduate/next-step">
              Take the next step
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="-third">
         <picture>
          <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hannah-oshea-medicine-student-studying-in-the-the-courtyard-48.x1d8ffd52.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 450px)" type="image/webp">
           <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hannah-oshea-medicine-student-studying-in-the-the-courtyard-48.x1d8ffd52.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 450px)">
            <source alt="" data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hannah-oshea-medicine-student-studying-in-the-the-courtyard-48.x1d8ffd52.jpg?w=405&amp;h=480&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" type="image/webp">
             <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hannah-oshea-medicine-student-studying-in-the-the-courtyard-48.x1d8ffd52.jpg?w=405&amp;h=480&amp;fit=crop"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </source>
         </picture>
         <div class="content -bg-pink">
          <div class="card">
           <h3 class="heading-3">
            Accommodation
           </h3>
           <div class="description">
            <p>
             All of our students are guaranteed accommodation – because we want you to feel right at home.
            </p>
            <div class="button">
             <a class="-bright-pink-text" href="/choose-hull/student-life/accommodation">
              Find out more
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="-third">
         <picture>
          <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hull-university-open-day-saturday-7th-july-2018-462.x1acde6d4.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 450px)" type="image/webp">
           <source data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hull-university-open-day-saturday-7th-july-2018-462.x1acde6d4.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 450px)">
            <source alt="" data-srcset="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hull-university-open-day-saturday-7th-july-2018-462.x1acde6d4.jpg?w=405&amp;h=480&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" type="image/webp">
             <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/assets/section/homepage-2020/site-elements/img/hull-university-open-day-saturday-7th-july-2018-462.x1acde6d4.jpg?w=405&amp;h=480&amp;fit=crop"/>
            </source>
           </source>
          </source>
         </picture>
         <div class="content -bg-teal">
          <div class="card">
           <h3 class="heading-3">
            Fees and finance
           </h3>
           <div class="description">
            <p>
             See why university makes good financial sense, and find out how our cash awards could help you.
            </p>
            <div class="button">
             <a class="-deep-teal-text" href="/choose-hull/study-at-hull/money">
              Find out more
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
     <section class="discover-research">
      <div class="_container">
       <div class="top -row">
        <div class="content">
         <h2 class="heading-2 -large">
          Life-changing research
         </h2>
         <p>
          Our research has an impact globally, every single day. Join us in tackling the big issues – climate change, health inequalities, social injustice and more – and help us shape a fairer, brighter and carbon neutral future for all.
         </p>
         <div class="button -bg-pink">
          <a href="/work-with-us/research/">
           Discover research
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="active-slide">
         <div class="slider slide-life-active">
          <div>
           <a href="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/2021/university-of-hull-phd-student-dr-jazmin-scarlett-wins-coveted-geological-society-award">
            <div class="item">
             <picture>
              <source data-srcset="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/phd-jazmin-scarlett-award-news-1-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 450px)" type="image/webp">
               <source data-srcset="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/phd-jazmin-scarlett-award-news-1-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=410&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 450px)">
                <source data-srcset="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/phd-jazmin-scarlett-award-news-1-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=564&amp;h=300&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 604px)" type="image/webp">

               </time>

        <div class="content-container">
         <div class="content">
          <p class="subtitle">
           Our vision and values
          </p>
          <h3 class="heading-2">
           We are shaping a fairer, brighter and carbon neutral future for all
          </h3>
          <div class="button">

              <h3 class="title">

              </h3>
              <p class="subtitle">
               <time datetime="11 March 2021">
                11 March 2021
               </time>
              </p>
             </div>
             <picture>
              <source data-srcset="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/sarah-clark-and-professor-dan-parsons-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=400&amp;h=160&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 650px)" type="image/webp">
               <source data-srcset="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/sarah-clark-and-professor-dan-parsons-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=400&amp;h=160&amp;fit=crop" media="(max-width: 650px)">
                <source alt="" data-srcset="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/sarah-clark-and-professor-dan-parsons-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=210&amp;h=250&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" type="image/webp">
                 <img alt="" class="lazy" data-src="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/sarah-clark-and-professor-dan-parsons-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=210&amp;h=250&amp;fit=crop"/>
                </source>
               </source>
              </source>
             </picture>
            </div>
           </a>
          </div>
          <div>
           <a href="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/2021/a-poet-for-our-times-andrew-marvell-and-the-covid-19-pandemic">
            <div class="item">
             <div class="content">
              <p class="subtitle">
               News
              </p>
              <h3 class="title">
               A poet for our times - Andrew Marvell and the Covid-19 pandemic
              </h3>
              <p class="subtitle">
               <time datetime="11 March 2021">
                11 March 2021
               </time>
              </p>
             </div>
             <picture>
              <source data-srcset="/work-with-us/more/media-centre/news/site-elements/img/portrait-of-andrew-marvell-by-vincent-galloway-1894-1977-hull-museums-collections-kincm-2005.37-cropped-400x300.jpg?w=400&amp;h=160&amp;fit=crop&amp;format=webp" media="(max-width: 650px)" type="image/webp">
